## Graphic Design

I became interested in graphic design as a college student, influenced by my early childhood education's emphasis on visual arts. As someone who was naturally inclined towards science, I think I liked the precision associated with computer assisted graphic design, and also applying those challenges towards understanding and demystifying science.

These are some examples of my graphic design work.
